Gokdo.com est accessible via une applica: Gokdo.com is accessible through a Google Play application or by visiting the website https://gokdo.com. It is a free gaming site with no purchase obligation.
Les joueurs reçoivent chaque jour 10 par:
Players receive 10 free games per day on the multiplayer game GoFRUITS.
10 additional games on GoFRUITS can be exchanged for 5 Rubies. The goal of the GoFRUITS game is to find the highest possible win. The game grid is regenerated once the highest win is found, and some squares in the GoFRUITS grid are losing squares.
Il faut 10 Rubis pour faire une partie s: It takes 10 Rubies to play a game on the Pool game. The multiplayer Pool game is 100% winning, there are no losing squares. The goal of the Pool game is to find the highest possible win. If the highest win is found, a new grid is generated.
Chaque mois, un concours est en place su: Every month, a contest is held on Gokdo for a predetermined period that can be modified at any time. Each contest offers prizes to the top 3000 players in the ranking and awards them with a prize, such as an Amazon gift card, PayPal transfer, Coins, Rubies, or Diamonds. Starting from the 3001st player, they won't win anything.
Les membres qui le désirent peuvent fair: Members who wish to do so can make a purchase via PayPal or credit card in the pack section of the site menu, which allows the purchase of additional Rubies. Gokdo remains a free gaming site with no purchase obligation.

Orders are shipped within a maximum of 30 days. The webmaster may delete orders from players who have violated the rules.

Le jeu Events est présent chaque mois po: The Events game is available every month for a duration of 15 days on the Gokdo.com website. It is usually a multiplayer level-based game with a cumulative jackpot that allows you to win more Diamonds, Rubies, or Coins. You get one free game every day!

Pourquoi traitons-nous vos données ?: Why do we process your data?
Notre priorité absolue est la sécurité d: Our top priority is the security of customer data, and as such, we can only process minimal data about users, only to the extent that it is absolutely necessary to maintain the website. The automatically collected information is used solely to identify potential cases of abuse and establish statistical information regarding the use of the website. This statistical information is not otherwise aggregated in such a way as to identify a particular user of the system. You can visit the website without telling us who you are or revealing any information by which someone could identify you as a specific and identifiable individual. However, if you wish to use certain features of the website, or if you wish to receive our newsletter or provide other details by filling out a form, you may provide us with personal data such as your email, first name, last name, city of residence, organization, phone number. You can choose not to provide us with your personal data, but then you may not be able to take advantage of certain features of the website. For example, you will not be able to receive our newsletter or contact us directly from the website. Users who are unsure about which information is mandatory are invited to contact us via the contact area located at the bottom of the page.

L'accès au site est-il gratuit ?: Is access to the site free?
Access to the site is completely free. You only need to pay for your internet connection; there are no additional charges. Gokdo is a free gaming site with no purchase obligation!
Le Diamant est la principale monnaie vir: Diamond is the main virtual currency of the site. Diamonds accumulate when you play games and allow you to order Gifts. You can earn Diamonds by playing GoFRUITS, POOL, and also through contests and events. The Diamonds you earn are stored in your Player Account. To view your Player Account, your earning history, and the Gifts you have won and ordered, simply click on 'Profile' at the top right of the page. It is important to note that Diamonds have no monetary value.
Les Rubis vous permettent d'obtenir des: Rubies allow you to get Bonus rounds in the game GoFRUITS, play the POOL game, as well as other Events games, and obtain virtual items in the Tresor game. You can obtain Rubies in the Gifts section by exchanging them for Diamonds from your account or in the 'Packs' area.
Le Coin est la monnaie secondaire du sit: The Coin is the secondary currency of the site, 1 Coin = 1€. You can accumulate Coins by winning them in the POOL game, the contest, or the Events games. There is a dedicated Coin shop available on the 'Gifts' page by clicking on the 'COINS' tab, where you can exchange them for Amazon vouchers as well as Paypal payments.

Comment participer au concours ?: How to participate in the contest?
Lorsqu'un concours est en place, il vous: When a contest is active, simply go to the 'Contest' page to see which game will allow you to collect contest points. The contest has a start date and an end date, and the top 3000 ranked players in the contest will be rewarded when the contest is over. The prizes awarded in the contest can be Amazon vouchers, Paypal payments, Coins, Rubies, or Diamonds. In any case, the contest will be free with no purchase obligation.
